version_description:
Added support for the following barcode symbologies:
- Canada Post
- Code 49
- DMRE
- GridMatrix
- GS1 DataBar Stacked, Limited, Expanded, Expanded Stacked & EAN/JAN, Limited and GS1-128 Composites
- MicroQR

Added support for the following barcode symbologies:
- Canada Post
- Code 49
- DMRE
- GridMatrix
- GS1 DataBar Stacked, Limited, Expanded, Expanded Stacked & EAN/JAN, Limited and GS1-128 Composites
- MicroQR

1.6.0
- Uses 16.1.4 CortexDecoder
- No longer truncates scanned barcodes.
- Added large display feature for displaying contents of large barcodes.

1.6.0
- Uses 16.1.4 CortexDecoder
- No longer truncates scanned barcodes.
- Added large display feature for displaying contents of large barcodes.

1.7.0
- Bug fixes
- Updated contact url

1.7.0
- Bug fixes
- Updated contact url

- Uses 16.1.36 CortexDecoder
- Added multi-barcode support
- Added new feature to highlight scanned barcodes
- Added switch to enable/disable playing beep sound on successful scan
- Fixed bug so that volume controls control the volume level when playing beep sound

- Uses 16.1.36 CortexDecoder
- Added multi-barcode support
- Added new feature to highlight scanned barcodes
- Added switch to enable/disable playing beep sound on successful scan
- Fixed bug so that volume controls control the volume level when playing beep sound

Here's what our latest update include: 
* Uses CortexDecoder 18.2.0
* Added support for Code Sled hardware
* Added support for Data Formatting and Data Validation
* Added support for 4k video resolution
* Added support for Camera Zoom
* Added support to scan Configuration codes
* Added support for additional customization of fixed focus
* Bug Fixes and enhancements

Here's what our latest update include: 
* Uses CortexDecoder 18.2.0
* Added support for Code Sled hardware
* Added support for Data Formatting and Data Validation
* Added support for 4k video resolution
* Added support for Camera Zoom
* Added support to scan Configuration codes
* Added support for additional customization of fixed focus
* Bug Fixes and enhancements

Here's what our latest update include: 
* New redesigned UI
* Uses CortexDecoder 18.3.15
* added support for Dot code symbology
* Added support for additional Code Sled hardware
* Added new Robust mode to decode difficult barcodes
* Bug Fixes and enhancements

Here's what our latest update include: 
* New redesigned UI
* Uses CortexDecoder 18.3.15
* added support for Dot code symbology
* Added support for additional Code Sled hardware
* Added new Robust mode to decode difficult barcodes
* Bug Fixes and enhancements

Here's what our latest update include: 
* Uses CortexDecoder 19.1.4
* Supports scanning DPM barcodes
* Supports various Data Parsing and Formatting
* Fixed a bug with highlight scanned barcodes feature to be misplaced sometimes
* Other Bug Fixes and enhancements

Here's what our latest update include: 
* Uses CortexDecoder 19.1.4
* Supports scanning DPM barcodes
* Supports various Data Parsing and Formatting
* Fixed a bug with highlight scanned barcodes feature to be misplaced sometimes
* Other Bug Fixes and enhancements
Fixes an issue where app would incorrectly redirect to App Store.
Fixes an issue where app would incorrectly redirect to App Store.
* Updated SDK to v 3.6.6
* Updated SDK to v 3.6.6

The CortexScan app is all new and optimized for helping you choose the ideal settings for your industry. Give it a try and contact us if you would like to learn more about purchasing our SDK to build into your solution.

The CortexScan app is all new and optimized for helping you choose the ideal settings for your industry. Give it a try and contact us if you would like to learn more about purchasing our SDK to build into your solution.
- Bug fixes and improvements.
